title: Pixel 3 won't update
content:
My daughter's Pixel 3 won't update. Each time she checks for updates, she gets this message : "can't check for update".

The phone is definitely connected to the internet at the time, and the message comes up very quickly.

It's currently at Android 10, September update.

Has anyone else had this issue ? Any suggestions ?

Thanks, John
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
